body_html: I see. I did end up figuring out how to enable it however. The easiest way might just be using this cmake module , and including it in aten/CmakeList.txt above the OpenMP section. I have to say that it adds an pretty significant CPU perfomance boost.
body_text: I see. I did end up figuring out how to enable it however. The easiest way might just be using this cmake module , and including it in aten/CmakeList.txt above the OpenMP section. I have to say that it adds an pretty significant CPU perfomance boost.
body: I see. I did end up figuring out how to enable it however. The easiest way might just be using this [cmake module](https://github.com/CLIUtils/cmake/blob/2acdd6dd3f61dddba3448ab231e4adcf274a3ec3/PatchOpenMPApple.cmake) , and including it in `aten/CmakeList.txt` above the OpenMP section. I have to say that it adds an pretty significant CPU perfomance boost.
